//SPEAKING WITH ME Suggest a new rule Suggest a minigame Submit feedback or a message Suggest a quote Suggest a new cocktail Suggest a new drink Add a player Remove a player See current list of players Add/Remove players Who dares to leave! left the game! Not cool 😡 You can't remove players if there are none… You can't see the list of players if there are none… Player's name Add has joined the game! Please enter the name of the new player
//LANGUAGES Choose your language 🇺🇸 English 🇫🇷 Français This will start a new deck.
Current players will however be kept. This will start a new deck.
//QUOTES YEEHA Oh hi Mark Hello there Nothing to see here ZEUS Just do it When in doubt, slap your balls Press here to submit your quote Puking is restarting It's a shoe No sleeping before midnight 🤫 The only limit to fun is yours I'll see you in 23 nuggets DISCLAIMER: These quotes are not to be taken seriously CHIIIIILL Baby Shark doo doo doo doo doo doo Eating sugar? Add your quote by pressing here Here, it's PIM-PIM 36 42 Execute Order 15–32 Try swiping the screen Too much is always better than not enough What?? 6 Squirrel, a sixth of squirrel, 3 Squirrel For extra carnage turn sips into shots This is where the fun begins Mixture is always healthy Want to see one of your quotes? Press here 😎 Pipe down Fresh This is a bit good But this app is a bit better
//Home Screen Boozely The Boozeled Game! Cocktail Menu Tips for Drinks! A random quote will appear here!
Warning By continuing you confirm that:

You meet every legal requirement regarding the purchase, possession and consumption of alcohol.

You understand that any quotes displaying on the homescreen are there for comic purposes.

You are responsible for whatever happens while using Boozely.

You are here to have fun.

This waiver is too long…

WkrjNgvwenVGovwncwOkvn Yep, totally! Absolutely not!
//SPECIALS Merry Christmas! something useless Happy New Year ! Don't forget your new year's resolutions
//HALLOWEEN COCKTAILS Tequila, Tangerine Lemonade, Grenadine, Black Sugar For 2L:
- Pour 300mL of Tequila
- Add 600mL of Tangerine Lemonade
- Complete to the 1L mark with Grenadine
- Top up with ice, mix

Sprinkle Black Sugar on the glasses' rim Gin, Pomegranate Juice, Simple Syrup For 2L (you will need a shaker):
- Pour 600mL of Gin
- Add 300mL of Pomegranate Juice
- Complete to the 1L mark with the Syrup
- Fill the rest with ice, shake for at least 30s

Add cubes of dry ice for a better effect Vodka, Chartreuse, Black Currant Juice For 2L:
- Pour 375mL of Vodka
- Add 125mL of Chartreuse
- Complete with Black Currant Juice and ice, mix Vodka, Grenadine, Lemonade For 2L:
- Put 8 shots of vodka (25mL the shot)
- Add 150mL of Grenadine
- Pour Lemonade up until the 1L mark
- Complete with ice, mix Gin, White Rum, Tequila (Silver), Vodka, Blue Curacao, Sour Mix, Sparkling Water For 2L (you will need a shaker):
- Fill the shaker with ice
- Add 1 part of each alcohol and extra shot of Blue Curacao
-Add 2 parts of Sour Mix
-Shake well

Add the Sparkling Water directly in the glasses to your liking Gin, Ginger Ale, Cranberry Bitters, Grenadine For 2L:
- Pour 300mL of Gin
- Add 600mL of Ginger Ale
- Put 8 dashes of Cranberry Bitter
- Complete with ice, mix

Pour a shot of Grenadine inside the edge of the glasses after pouring Brandy, Root Beer Schnapps, Pineapple Juice For 2L (you will need a shaker):
- Fill the shaker with ice
- Put 375mL of Brandy
- Add 275mL of Root Beer Schnapps
- Complete with Pineapple Juice
- Shake well
// HALLOWEEN CARDS Special Halloween 🎃 Trick or Treat! 🎃
Do a dare or down the drink of the player on your right! The other players in the room can give you a challenging dare.
You can either choose to do the dare or down the drink of the player on your right!


You can always down the drink of the player on your right before doing the dare… 
You know if you need more courage? 👻

// Special Halloween pumpkin
// CHRISTMAS CARDS Santa's Card The Grinch's Card The Grinch's Gift Santa's Gift
You are now Santa Clause!
Give out 1 sip to anyone at each turn! You are the new Grinch!
At anytime you can swap two players' glasses! You have received a good gift!
You can reduce the number of sips you take by 1! Here's a bad gift!
Increase the numbers of sips you take by 1!
Until someone else draws this card, you can give 1 sip to whoever you want each time a player picks a new card! Until someone else draws this card, you can swap the glasses of two players at any moment as much as you want! When you have to drink, you can reduce the amount of sips you are supposed to take by 1! When you drink, you have to increase the amount of sips you are supposed to take by 1!
Current Santa Clause: none Current Grinch: none Player who received the good gift:
none Player who received the bad gift:
none Current Santa Clause: Current Grinch: Player who received the good gift:
 Player who received the bad gift:

//Cocktail Menu Cocktails Press here to submit a Cocktail! Sort By: Default Name Alcohol Level (least to most) Number of Spirits Needed *New*
//COCKTAILS INGREDIENTS Alcohols. Vodka, Passion Fruit Syrup, Lime, Mint Vanilla Vodka, Candies Pink Gin, Black Raspberry Liqueur, Lemonade Peach Schnapps, Blue Curacao, Orange Juice, Lemonade Orange Liqueur Triple Sec, Vodka, Tequila, Rum, Gin, Gomme Syrup, Lemon Juice, Cola Vanilla Vodka, Mango, Passion Fruit & Orange Juices, Lemonade Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry & Orange Juices White Rum, Coconut White Rum, Mango, Passion Fruit & Pineapple Juice Vodka, Blue Curacao, Grenadine, Lemonade Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Cranberry Juice Vodka, Blue Curacao, Lime Cordial, Lemonade Scotch Whiskey, Amaretto, Cola White Rum, Sugar, Lime & Passion Fruit Juices, Soda Water, Mint, (Champagne) White Rum, Coconut White Rum, Sugar, Coconut Milk, Pineapple Juice Tequila, Orange Liqueur Triple Sec, Lime Juice (& salt on the side) White Rum, Lime Juice, Sugar
You may also add any flavoured liqueurs or syrups White Rum, Dark Rum, Orange Liqueur, Lime, Pineapple & Orange Juices, Grenadine Cachaça, Lime, Sugar (you can add any fruit juices: recommended Apple or Pineapple) Vodka, Lime, Sugar (you can add any fruit juices: recommended Apple or Pineapple) Vodka, Orange Liqueur Triple Sec, Cranberry Juice Vodka, Ginger Beer, Lime Juice Vodka, Tomato Juice, Lemon Juice, Hot Sauce, Worcestershire Sauce, Salt, Black Pepper White Rum, Dark Rum, Spiced Rum, Gold Rum, Absinthe, Bitter Liqueurs, Pineapple Juice, Passion Fruit Juice, Orange Juice, Lime, Grenadine
//COCKTAILS RECIPES Get every alcohol you can find and mix them together… Good luck! - Take a 1L bottle of Vodka, pour 3 shots (25ml each)
- Add 50mL of Passion Fruit Syrup in the bottle
- Add pieces of Lime and Mint Leaves
- Mix and keep refrigerated - Take a 1L bottle of Vodka, pour 2 shots (25mL each)
- Add 6 fruit flavoured candies who's name rhyme with Zkittles in the bottle
- Wait until the candies turn white, distill several times
- Mix and keep refrigerated In a 2L recipient
- Pour 2 shots of Pink Gin (25mL each)
- Pour 2 shots of Raspberry Liqueur (25mL each)
- Add Lemonade until the 1L mark is reached
- Mix and add ice until the full recipient is full In a 2L recipient
- Pour 2 shots of Peach Schnapps (25mL each)
- Pour 2 shots of Blue Curacao (25mL each)
- Add Orange Juice 2/3rd's of the way to the 1L mark
- Add Lemonade to the 1L mark
- Mix and add ice until the top In a 2L recipient
- Add 1 shot of each alcohol (25mL the shot)
- Pour a shot of Gomme Syrup
- Fill until the 2/3rd's of 1L mark with Cola
- Add Lemon Juice up to the 1L mark
- Fill the rest with ice In a 2L recipient
- Pour 4 shots of Vanilla Vodka (25mL each)
- Add 150mL of Lemonade
- Add 250mL of each Mango, Passion Fruit & Orange Juice
- Mix and fill with ice In a 2L recipient
- Pour 2 shots of each Vodka and Peach Schnapps (25mL the shot)
- Fill halfway to the 1L mark with Orange Juice
- Add Cranberry Juice until the 1L mark
- Mix and complete with ice In a 2L recipient
- Add 2 shots of each White Rum and Coconut Liqueur (25mL the shot)
- Pour 300mL of each juices
- Mix and fill with ice In a 2L recipient 
- Pour 2 shots of both Vodka and Blue Curacao (25mL the shot) 
- Add 100mL of Grenadine 
- Complete until the 1L mark with Lemonade 
- Mix and fill with ice In a 2L recipient 
- Add 50mL of both Vodka and Blue Curacao 
- Pour Cranberry Juice until the 1L mark 
- Mix and complete with ice In a 2L recipient 
- Pour 50mL of Vodka and 50mL of Blue Curacao 
- Add a shot of Lime Cordial 
- Complete with Lemonade and ice, stir In a 2L recipient 
- Pour 2 shots of Whiskey (25mL each) 
- Add 2 shots of Amaretto (25mL each) 
- Fill with cola and ice, mix In a 2L recipient 
- Pour 100mL of Rum 
- Add 1 spoon of Sugar 
- Add 700mL of Lime and Passion Fruit Juices until the 1L mark 
- Pour 200mL of Soda Water, stir 
- Complete with ice, pieces of Lime and Mint Leaves, mix 
Add Champagne for a deluxe version! In a 2L recipient
- Pour 75mL of White Rum
- Add a shot of Coconut Liqueur (25mL)
- Add a spoon of Sugar
- Complete with ice, Coconut Milk and Pineapple Juice
- Shake In a 2L recipient
- Pour 2 shots of each Tequila and Orange Liqueur\- Fill the 1L mark with Lime Juice
- Complete with ice, mix
- Sparkle Salt on the glasses' rim In a 2L recipient
- Pour 4 shots of White Rum (25mL each)
- Add a spoon of Sugar
(- Add 2 shots of Liqueur)
- Fill until the 1L mark with Lime Juice
- Complete with ice, mix In a 2L recipient
- Pour 3 shots of White Rum (75mL)
- Add 1 shot of Dark Rum (25mL)
- Add 2 shots of Orange Liqueur (50mL)
- Add 75mL of Grenadine
- Pour Lime, Pineapple and Orange Juices until the 1L mark
- Complete with ice, mix In a 1.5L recipient (best with a shaker):
- Pour 700mL of Cachaça
- Add Lime and Sugar to your liking (recommended 5 Limes and 12 tea spoons of Sugar)
- Complete with ice, mix and crush In a 1.5L recipient (best with a shaker):
- Put 700mL of Vodka
- Add Lime and Sugar to your liking (recommended 5 Limes and 12 tea spoons of Sugar
- Compete with ice, mix and crush In a 2L recipient (best with a shaker):
- Pour 3 shots of Vodka and 1 shots of Cointreau (25mL the shot)
- Complete with Cranberry Juice up to the 1L mark
- Fill up with ice, mix and crush In a 2L recipe:
- Pour 4 shots of Vodka (100mL in total)
- Squeeze 25mL worth of Lime Juice
- Add Ginger Beer to the 1L mark
- Complete with ice, mix For 2L (you will need a shaker):
- Put 4 shots of Vodka (100mL in total)
- Pour 100mL of Lemon Juice
- Add 8 dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, a pinch of salt and pepper
- Fill up to the 1L mark with Tomato Juice
- Complete with ice, mix in the shaker
- Top up with ice if it's not full
- Add the Hot Sauce in the glasses (recommended for 2L is 8 dashes) For 2L (best with a shaker):
- Pour a shot of each alcohol (25mL the shot)
- Add the juices just below the 1L mark
- Top up with Grenadine
- Fill the recipient with ice, mix and shake well
//Tips And Drinks Menu Tips for Drinks! Press here to submit a drink
or see my suggestions below! What can I mix with my
Alcohol?
Soft drink?
soft? alcohol? Mix it with one of the following:
//Open screen Boozely Hi, I'm the Drinkler!
I am in charge of you now… Boozely is a fun drinking card game best played at 8.
Very much like the King's Cup or the Ring of Fire, each card will dictate your fate.
Tap the screen or swipe left and try to keep your face straight. 😜 Please don't drink responsibly and make sure that at least a third of the players can't make it back on their own. Start Boozely!
Warning Please drink responsibly.

Do you agree that by continuing you take full responsibility, regardless of what is said on the next screens, for any consequences that may result from the use of Boozely? *sigh*… Yeah Umm… No.
//Player Name Screen Get Boozeled! The Boozely icon The name of a player 🎉 Player 1
//PLAYER Player 1 Player 2 Player 3 Player
//PLAYERS Player
Please enter different player names Entering players is optional is already here
//CARD SCREEN PRESS THE CARD TO START
PRESS HERE OR THE '?' FOR EXPLANATIONS cardImage GameCardGames The joker icon Press the button that will appear here for explanations Card image used to add the animations No more cards left!! REPLAY! 😃 CLOSE GAME 😡
WHAT WILL YOU DO!!! 😱 😃 😡 🍸 🥃 54 There are no previous cards…
//Card explain Explanations Press the back of the card or swipe left to start the game.

IF YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND A RULE:
A little orange '?' button will be at the top of each card.
Press that button or the text under the card to know what to do precisely.

GETTING THE NEXT OR PREVIOUS CARD:
Swipe left or tap the card to pick another random one.
Swipe right or long press a card to go back to the previous one.

ADDING OR REMOVING PLAYERS IN-GAME:
Add or remove players in-game by pressing the Boozely icon.

SEEING WHICH ROLE IS HELP BY WHICH PLAYER:
Press the white and black 'i' info button on the right.
(Only visible if players were added)

SEEING THE OTHER MENUS WITHOUT LEAVING THE GAME:
See the Cocktail Menu or the Tips for Drinks Menu by pressing the according icons under the info button or under the Boozely icon.

SENDING FEEDBACK OR SUGGESTIONS:
Send mails and messages directly to me by pressing the mail icon!
//Roles Current Roles Rule maker(s): none Rule maker(s): King of thumbs: none King of thumbs: Queen of bitches: none Queen of bitches:
//Snackbars You're a hoe!
Signed: The Drinkler F.B.I Agent: 😮 That must hurt… You're welcome! 😁

//FULL APP Send Cancel Close
//LEAVING GAME You are leaving?! Are you sure you want to leave this fabulous BOOZELY game? Duh…Yes Oh hell no!!
//CARD DECK CARDS 2 of Clubs 3 of Clubs 4 of Clubs 5 of Clubs 6 of Clubs 7 of Clubs 8 of Clubs 9 of Clubs 10 of Clubs Jack of Clubs Queen of Clubs King of Clubs Ace of Clubs
2 of Diamonds 3 of Diamonds 4 of Diamonds 5 of Diamonds 6 of Diamonds 7 of Diamonds 8 of Diamonds 9 of Diamonds 10 of Diamonds Jack of Diamonds Queen of Diamonds King of Diamonds Ace of Diamonds

Black Joker Red Joker
//CARDS SIMPLE RULES Pick a partner!
And give out 2 sips each! Pick a partner!
And drink 2 sips each! I'm not racist but…
Take 3 sips! You may give out 3 sips! I'm not sexist but…
Take 3 sips! Touch the floor!
Loser takes 4! Four for whores!
Every girl drinks 4 sips each! Four from whores!
Every girl can give out 4 sips each! Point the sky!
Loser takes 5! Five for guys!
Every boy takes 5 sips each! Five from guys!
Every boy can give out 5 sips each! Guess what?
You may drink 6 sips! You have been chosen!
You may give out 6 sips! Guess what?
You may give out 6 sips! Lucky you!
You need to take 6 sips! Rock, Paper, Scissors!
Best of 3!
Loser takes 4/Winner gives 3! Never have you ever?
2 sips at stake! Minigame!
Make one up or choose from the list! (press here) Minigame!
Make one up or choose from the list! (press here) Category!
4 sips at stake! Rhyme!
4 sips at stake! What is in your suitcase?
5 sips at stake! You got stuff in your suitcase!
5 sips at stake! Truth or dare?
Or down your drink! New Rule!
Invent or choose a new rule from the list! (press here) 👑 New Queen of Bitches! 👑
4 sips to those who answer your questions! 👑 New King of thumbs! 👑
2 sips for the loser! Democracy! Here's a special treat from me!
Everyone downs their drink! I didn't know which card to give 
😒
So choose your card!
//CARDS DETAILED RULES Pick someone who has to drink every time you do and vice versa for the rest of the game!

Start this partnership by drinking 2 sips each!

Another 2 sips each if either one of you drinks alone! Pick someone who has to drink every time you do and vice versa for the rest of the game!

Start this partnership by giving 2 sips each to anyone!

Drink 2 sips if either one of you drinks alone! *inhales*… DRINK 3 SIPS! Yep… DRINK 3 SIPS! You have a total of 3 sips to hand out! Touch the floor with your hand as fast as you can!

The last one who copies must drink 4 sips! Every girl in the room has to take 4 sips! Every girl in the room can give out 4 sips!
Give them out to whoever you want!

If you're wondering why you can only give out 4, it's because you're a whore. Raise your hand.

Last one to copy drinks 5 sips! Every boy in the room has to take 5 sips!

If you're wondering why you have to take five, it's because I haven't called you a whore. Every boy in the room can give out 5 sips!
Give them out to whoever you want! You're not dreaming… DRINK 6 SIPS!

Crazy right? You read it correctly… DRINK 6 SIPS! You have a total of 6 sips to hand out! Challenge any player to a Rock, Paper, Scissors game!

Best of 3, the loser drinks 4 sips, the winner has 3 sips to hand out! Say something you never did.
Those who did (including yourself) must drink 2 sips.

eg:
'Never have I ever jumped off a plane.'
Those who jumped off a plane must drink. 
 Choose a word.
Around the room, everyone must find another word that rhymes.

If someone repeats or cannot find, he must drink 4 sips!

NOTE:
If a rhyme was made or a word was used in a previous round, it cannot be used again. Choose a category (car brands, animals, etc…).
Everyone must then find a word that falls in your category.

If you repeat a word already said this round or any previous rounds, or cannot find another word, drink 4 sips! One-by-one, add something to your suitcase (noun + adjective) starting by you.

eg:
Player 1 says 'In my suitcase I have a green car'.
Player 2 then must say : 'In my suitcase I have a green car and a blue rabbit'.

The game continues until someone forgets, says something incorrectly or in the wrong order. That person drinks 5 sips! The other players can ask you a truth or a dare depending on your choice.

Down your glass in case of refusal! 
 Also known as Question Master.

You can ask questions at anytime, as much as you want. If someone replies, that person must drink 4 sips!

You have that power until another player draws a queen! 👑 You can place your thumb under your chin whenever you want, as much as you want.

When you do, all the other players must do the same.
The last one who copies must drink 2 sips!

You have this power until another player draws a king! 👑 All at once say 'Democracy' and point at anyone.
Drink as many sips as there are people pointing at you.

eg: player 1, 2 and 3 points player 4.
Player 4 points player 1.
Therefore player 1 drinks 1 sip (1 player pointed at him),
player 2 and 3 drinks 0 (no-one pointed at them),
player 4 drinks 3 sips (3 players pointed at him).

NOTE:
Everyone needs to say democracy and designate someone at the same time.
You can designate whomever you want. You read it correctly… EVERYONE MUST DOWN THEIR DRINK!

Signed:
The Drinkler Choose whatever you want, others will have to obey or drink! 😜
//MINIGAMES!! The Squirrel Game PIM-PIM The Game Of Claps 20 + 1
TONGUE-TWISTER with 3 sips at stake!

You are now called '1 Squirrel', '2 Squirrel', etc…
Your names stay the same throughout the whole of the Squirrel Game.

Simply call each other using your new names, separated by 'a sixth of squirrel':
Player 1:'1 squirrel, a sixth of squirrel, 3 squirrel'
Player 3:'3 squirrel, a sixth of squirrel, 2 squirrel'
Player 2:'2 squirrel, etc…

 Say it as clear and as quickly as possible.
Stutter, be unclear or be too slow and you're out (drink)!

 The game ends when there are 3 players left. Choose an object (an empty plastic bottle, keys, etc…) and call it PIM-PIM.

 Here's how the game goes:
Player 1: (Throwing PIM-PIM to player 2) Here, it's PIM-PIM
Player 2: (Receiving PIM-PIM) What is it?
Player 1: It's PIM-PIM
Player 2: (throwing PIM-PIM to player 3) Here, it's PIM-PIM
Player 3: (Receiving PIM-PIM) What is it?
Player 2: (Asking player 1) What is it?
Player 1: (To player 2) It's PIM-PIM
Player 2: (To player 3) It's PIM-PIM
Player 3: (Throwing PIM-PIM) etc…

 NOTE:
You may pass PIM-PIM to whoever you want.

State the wrong sentence, ask the wrong person or speak when you shouldn't.... Drink 3 and leave!

The game ends when there are 2 players left.
 Clap one after the other, clockwise, as fast as possible.
One clap, same way.
Two claps, reverse!

Clap more than twice, when it's not your turn or take too long, drink 3 and leave the game.

 eg: In a game of 3 players:
Player 1 starts.
Player 1: Clap
Player 2: Clap
Player 3: Clap Clap (changes order)
Player 2: Clap 
etc…

 The game ends when there are 2 players left. 



COACHING IS DRINKING:

WHOEVER READS PAST THIS LINE OR EXPLAINS THE RULES HAS TO DOWN HIS DRINK!!







5 rounds.
Start by saying: 'I propose a game of 20+1, starting on my [right or left] with [either '1', '1, 2' or '1, 2, 3'].

One by one, count up to 21.
You are allowed to say up to 3 numbers at the time.
1 number, continue as normal,
2 numbers reverse,
3 numbers skip the next player.

If you happen to be the one saying the number 21 or an equivalent, finish your glass and add a rule!

You are not allowed to say the number 21.
You are not allowed to repeat 2 numbers twice in a row
eg:
Player A: '1, 2'
Player B can either say '3' or '3, 4, 5' but not '3, 4'.

Speak when it's not your turn, forget (or repeat) a number or break any of the above rules and you drink!
 The round then ends and starts again from the person on your left.
//RULES!! FPS Buffalo Chicken Drinkorilla Order 15–32 International Drinking Rules The Drinkler's Rules
Whenever you shout 'FPS' everyone needs to get into the Fetal Position of Security.

The last one to be in this position has to drink! When you drink, use your weak hand or drink one more. Finish each of your sentences with the word 'Chicken'. 
If you don't, drink a sip! Bang your chest twice every time after you drink.
If you don't, you must drink what you just drank once more!

 eg:
If you just downed your drink but forgot to Drinkorilla, you must down another. At anytime, anyone can order another player to take 3 sips by saying: 'Order 15–32 [name of the victim] drink!'

Once the 3 sips were taken, that player needs to give a valid reason agreed by everyone else and/or the victim, or top up his glass and down it.

 Order 15–32 means 'I know what I'm doing, obey, I'll explain later.'" - No saying the word 'drink'!
- No saying any other player's first name, or whatever they are usually called by!
- No fucking swearing!
- Don't you dare point with an extended finger!
- Like a damn lady, put your pinkie out while drinking!
- Drink with your weak hand!
- Keep your drink at least a thumb's length from the edge of the table!
- An empty glass cannot be put down: it must be refilled before!
- Spillage is lickage: if you spill a drink, you must suck it up on the surface where it was spilled with your mouth immediately!

A disobedience of any of these rules will result with a 2 sip penalty! Apply of all the following rules:
- FPS
- Drinkorilla
- Order 15–32
- International Drinking Rules

But with 4 sips as punishment!
//Drink Menu - Tonic Water - Lemonade - Orange Juice (Sweet) - Mango Juice (Sweet) - Pineapple Juice (Sweet) - Apple Juice (Sweet) - Cranberry Juice (Bitter) - Grapefruit Juice (Bitter) - Ginger Beer (Spicy) - Soda Water - Multi Fruit Juices (Sweet or Bitter) - Straight - Cola - Coconut Water - Energy Drinks - Salt & Lime - Water
Tonic Water Lemonade Orange Juice Mango Juice Pineapple Juice Apple Juice Cranberry Juice Grapefruit Juice Ginger Beer Soda Water Multi Fruit Juices Straight Cola Coconut Water Energy Drinks Salt & Lime Water
Juices Sodas Others
Gin Flavoured Gin White Rum Spiced Rum Dark Rum Vodka Vodka Vanilla Scotch Bourbon Other Whiskeys Liqueurs Amaretto Peach Schnapps Coconut Rum Cognac Tequila Jägermeister
Rum Whiskey Other
